item.rel_title: Wuhan and Hubei COVID-19 mortality analysis reveals the critical role of timely supply of medical resources
item.rel_abs: We report that COVID-19 mortality and recovery rates in Hubei Province, China exponentially decays (R2>0.93) and grows (R2>0.95), respectively. A great number of newly supplied medical resources (health workers and beds) enabled overwhelming patients to be treated effectively. This may help other countries to deal with the coming COVID-19 outbreaks.
item.rel_authors: Zhang, Z.; Yao, W.; Wang, Y.; Long, C.; FU, X.
